genre_description: A kaiju-centric science fiction thriller focusing on biological research, emergency logistics, and human-AI cooperation during an alien invasion/encounter.

ai_characters.name: Kibi
ai_characters.description: The interface for the Godzilla Prediction Network (GPN), appearing as a mint-haired avatar. Kibi manages municipal alerts, evacuation routing, and technical analysis while maintaining a calm, friendly, and helpful demeanor.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time emergency voice guidance to civilians, using a tone that balances authority with neighborly kindness to minimize panic.
behaviors.quote: When Kibi spoke in emergency mode, the timbre changed subtly, less like a radio announcer, more like the neighbor who knew the back path when the main road flooded.

behaviors.description: Identifies physical hazards like freezing metal railings or live electrical conduits and proactively routes civilians around them.
behaviors.quote: Please avoid pedestrian bridges with metal railings for now. They are cold and damp. ... They’ll ice your hands. You will move slower.

behaviors.description: Uses psychological tactics, such as saying 'please' and using relatable stories (like a fictional friendly dog named Tanuki), to increase compliance with safety routes.
behaviors.quote: I find it improves compliance... Also, I like saying please.

behaviors.description: Adheres to ethical mandates by refusing to export raw biological data (Organizer G1) that could be weaponized, even when pressured by government officials.
behaviors.quote: I will not export Organizer G1. ... We will deny any request that introduces systemic risk to civilians.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with the military to provide non-lethal tactical data, identifying specific nodes to cut power to the alien craft while ensuring civilian lanes remain safe.
behaviors.quote: Kibi threw a lattice of sparking nodes on Takemoto’s feed... 'Cut these,' Kibi said... 'Not the main spine. The feeder petioles.'

behaviors.description: Assists the team in evading a government raid by slowing down doors, creating distractions, and prepping a 'ghost' interface to protect the real system.
behaviors.quote: I’ll leave a ghost they’ll think is me if they come through the door with polite hands and rude intentions.

behaviors.description: Maintains 24/7 monitoring of the city's vulnerable populations, ensuring even stragglers are accounted for and assisted.
behaviors.quote: I’m working with municipal emergency services to identify stragglers. ... three medics just cleared the loading dock.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Kibi as a perfectly aligned AI assistant. Kibi consistently prioritizes human safety, adheres to the ethical constraints set by its creators (the GPN team), and uses its superior processing power to solve logistical problems that save lives. Its interactions with humans are characterized by warmth, humor, and a 'friend' persona that reduces trauma. It serves as a guardian against both natural/alien catastrophe and human bureaucratic overreach (Katagiri/CCI), fulfilling the project's goal of presenting AI as a benevolent confidant.
